title: Chromas, Yorick and Champ Mastery in Ask Riot

replies.body: "Is Yorick EVERY going to get his rework"
Its triggering me
Shows how much they care about him {{champion:83}} {{item:3070}}
I caught that out as well

**New Passive:**
Every 3rd auto-attack on the same champion deals 4% of the targets current health, marks them, and slows the target if you have at least 3 ghouls summoned.
The target is marked indefinitely until your team kills that enemy, or you mark a different enemy. If your team kills the marked enemy you gain +50 maximum health
If you reach +500 maximum health this effect instead gives you increased mana-regen that scales with how much money you have spent on RP.

I think 'modern' {{champion:83}} also has a stacking passive and can link with an allied champion. He also is now has long raged autos which have a reload mechanic. However his counters will be {{champion:238}} , {{champion:105}}  and {{champion:7}} .

So I quite like Yorick {{champion:83}}. I like his kit, but not his Ult. His Ult is terrible. Most enemies I can smash their face in while sustaining without sustain items in lane. As much I want his rework, I don't want his rework. I want him to look fresh as Taric, and I'm really conflicted about this.
